90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Amanda,
Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to reach out again and see if you would be interested in scheduling a call.
Look forward to hearing from you.
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, January 23, 2012 2:06 PM To: 'Amirran@yahoo.com' Subject: MBO Partners
Dear Amanda ,
Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Jake Levenson. Jake has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
